name: Blue Pencil
description:
Maintain formal design specs with frame tidying, numbering, and table of contents.


Current Features

  • Frame Tidying
  • Frame Numbering
  • Frame, Page, an File Name Injection
  • Last Modified Date


Planned Features

  • Table of Contents Generation


Usage

Most of the features of this plugin rely on a layer name including specific markup such as {framename} that results in specific information being injected into the contents of that layer. Other features such as the automatic frame arrangement are more passive and help keep the document organized.


The plugin has a UI that provides preferences for each feature and shows the markup used for each. The plugin may also be run using the "Revise" command which skips the UI but uses the most recent settings from the UI.
